author.name: Conchobar mac Dubhthach
author.description: An Irish bard of yore, who weaves dulcet melodies that capture hearts with tender love songs. With a quill dipped in courtly love, he pens metaphors of devotion, igniting the flames of passion in every soul who hears his verse.

newsMedieval:
Upon Tokyo's field of yonder eve,
Where plumes of smoke enrobe the air,
Two avian steeds their peace did cleave,
A woeful tale of flight's despair.

In a court of justice neath an Eastern star,
With chains of Tweet and Trump ties bound,
A rebel bard stands at the bar,
His pleas of innocence do resound.

In the halls of venture's gleaming trove,
Distrust doth creep like shadows long,
For in their wealth those sceptics rove,
Questioning if the worth is wrong.

feedItems.title: Japan Airlines Plane in Flames After Collision at Tokyo's Haneda Airport
feedItems.description: The passenger jet collided with a Japan Coast Guard plane on Tuesday evening local time, according to the country’s public broadcaster NHK.

feedItems.title: Hong Kong Dissident's Tweets, Ties To Trump Officials Cited in National Security Trial
feedItems.description: Prosecutors alleged media tycoon Jimmy Lai was the mastermind of a conspiracy to urge Western governments to sanction Chinese and Hong Kong officials. He pleaded not guilty to the charges.

feedItems.title: LPs Doubt Venture Funds' Startup Valuations
feedItems.description: Investors in venture funds are scrutinizing unrealized returns for overly optimistic projections, slowing down fundraising processes.

author.name: Guillemette de Ventadour
author.description: A whimsical troubadour from Occitania, who cherishes the company of nature's gentle creatures. She often includes metaphors of goats, dogs, rabbits, and snails in her poetry. Her writing style is terse.

newsMedieval:
Of dollar's dance and Fed's advance,
In market's stance, awaits its stance.
Goats graze the pasture, waiting wise,
'Gainst rising morn and dollar's rise.

Once champions on stock's firm ground,
Now snail-like crawl, no victory found.
Lucid and Lordstown, Faraday's dream,
Beneath the moonlight's fickle gleam.

To the dog who watches o'er his bone,
Seek not the 401(k) to lone ignore.
Rabbit swift in burrow's retreat,
Lost chances in slow paces meet.

feedItems.title: Dollar Firms as Market Awaits Data For Insight into Fed's Next Move
feedItems.description: The dollar rose against a basket of currencies as the market awaits U.S. economic data releases this week for insight into the Fed’s next move, XS.com said.

feedItems.title: Why Short Sellers Are Targeting Struggling EV Companies
feedItems.description: Electric vehicle manufacturers like Lucid, Lordstown Motors and Faraday Futures were big winners of the stock boom two years ago. Now all three companies’ shares are about to hit zero.

feedItems.title: How Often Should You Mess With Your 401(k)? More Than Before
feedItems.description: Compulsively checking your 401(k) is seen by behavioral economists as the source of bad investment decisions. Right now, though, looking at your portfolio too seldom could equally lead to missed opportunities.

author.name: Brother Arnulfus
author.description: A Benedictine monk who doth write devotional poems in Ænglish, praising God and the saints. His poems are often humorous, short, and satirical. They often contain metaphors of alcohol, especially wine or ale.

newsMedieval:
The CFOs gird 'gainst the unknown dread,
With checklists long and spirits fed.
As talent's managed, costs kept low,
They brace 'gainst macro winds that blow.

Investors hope, as they did vant,
For stable markets, normal slant.
The past year's turmoil they've endured,
Pray rate increases have ensured.

Rich men of means did Juul confer,
From insolvency's brink, a stir.
Yet cries of foul do fill the air,
From other souls, they claim unfair.

feedItems.title: As CFOs Prepare for an Unpredictable 2024, Here's What Tops Their Checklists
feedItems.description: From managing talent and controlling costs to monitoring macroeconomic trends and forging new partnerships, corporate finance chiefs are girding for volatility and uncertainty ahead.

feedItems.title: Investors' Hope for 2024: A Return to Long-Lost Normalcy
feedItems.description: Many think markets can find a more stable equilibrium after recent rate increases.

feedItems.title: Wealthy Investors Rescued Juul From Bankruptcy. Others Are Crying Foul.
feedItems.description: Two of Juul Labs’ longtime directors—a Hyatt Hotels heir and a venture capitalist—helped bail out the e-cigarette maker from the edge of insolvency. Now other investors are suing.

author.name: Æthelred the Skald
author.description: A Norse poet who doth regale his audience with tales of gods and heroes, praising their might and prowess. He references Norse mythology and history in his poems. He is known for metaphors involving the sea and the weather and weaponry.

newsMedieval:
Upon India's fertile earth, there lies a wolfish sorrow,
Her crops a speckled shield ‘gainst change, robust yet hollow.
As autumn wind dost turn the tides, her grains feed distant mouths,
A problem vast as whale's wide path, reaching Southern and Northern houses.

In land of freedom, fierce and bold, a sea-storm gathers hence,
Streams of wisdom wane like sunlight 'hind a cloud's pretense.
With silver sails torn asunder, kin of Odin seek new course,
In bundles, discounts, and whispers, they find their strength's new source.

An iron disruption sounds its horn, in the heart of trading chains,
Sudden as bird's wing in storm, as strange as summer rains.
New strategies unfold like runic maps in the smoky hall,
Pushed to pace by Norns cruel hand, they stand tall or they fall.

feedItems.title: India's Food-Security Problem Is the World's, Too
feedItems.description: India’s tightly controlled agricultural market has left food production highly vulnerable to climate change. That’s a global problem: India is a major food exporter.

feedItems.title: Americans Are Canceling More of Their Streaming Services
feedItems.description: Hulu and other streamers are turning to bundles, discounts and ad-supported plans as customer defections rise.

feedItems.title: New Disruptions, Geopolitics Hang Over 2024 Supply Chains
feedItems.description: Companies that assembled new supply chain strategies in the wake of the Covid-19 pandemic are having to put those plans into practice far faster than they may have thought possible.
